TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PasswordRecovery extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl

summary.span: 提供使用户在忘记密码时恢复或重置并在电子邮件中接收它的用户界面 (UI) 元素。

span.span: Provides user interface (UI) elements that enable a user to recover or reset a lost password and receive it in email.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [视图Views](#views) - [样式和模板Styles and Templates](#styles_and_templates) - [验证分组Validation Groupings](#validation_groupings) - [应用 CSS 样式Applying CSS Styles](#applying_styles) - [辅助功能Accessibility](#accessibility) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 控件可帮助用户忘记其密码。The control assists users who have forgotten their passwords. 它使用户请求包含一个新密码或已与他或她的用户名相关联的密码的电子邮件。It enables a user to request an email message containing either a new password or the password already associated with his or her user name. > [!NOTE] > Web 控件使用 Internet 电子邮件服务向用户发送已恢复的或新的密码。The Web control uses Internet email services to send recovered or new passwords to users. 有电子邮件中发送密码的固有安全风险。There are inherent security risks with sending passwords in email. 你应该确定是否可以接受你的站点的这些安全风险。You should determine whether these security risks are acceptable to your site. > [!NOTE] > 如果你不熟悉的 ASP.NET 提供的登录控件集，请参阅[ASP.NET 登录控件概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac032230-6469-4b03-b68d-03ef2643a24d)才能继续。If you are not familiar with the set of login controls available in ASP.NET, see [ASP.NET Login Controls Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac032230-6469-4b03-b68d-03ef2643a24d) before continuing. 有关与登录控件和成员资格相关的其他主题的列表，请参阅[使用成员资格管理用户](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd)。For a list of other topics related to login controls and membership, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd). 仅当成员资格提供程序定义中时，用户可以恢复密码属性支持明文密码或加密的密码。Users can recover passwords only when the membership provider defined in the property supports clear text or encrypted passwords. 因为无法恢复经过哈希处理的密码，使用经过哈希处理的密码的站点的用户只能重置其密码。Because hashed passwords cannot be recovered, users at sites that use hashed passwords can only reset their passwords. > [!IMPORTANT] > 接受用户输入是一个潜在的安全威胁。Accepting user input is a potential security threat. 恶意用户可以发送数据，用于公开的漏洞或运行程序会尝试生成的密码。Malicious users can send data that is intended to expose vulnerabilities or run programs that try generated passwords. 为了提高安全性，处理用户输入时，应使用的控件的验证功能和安全配置的任何数据提供程序为您的控件。To improve security when working with user input, you should use the validation features of your control and secure any data providers that are configured for your control. 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护登录控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)， [Web 应用程序的基本安全实践](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3eeeee9e-b09f-4c7f-8ce5-d9ca1f9322ad)，和[保护成员资格](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2dab2012-c278-426a-bb0d-93b260c428a7)。For more information, see [Securing Login Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c), [Basic Security Practices for Web Applications](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3eeeee9e-b09f-4c7f-8ce5-d9ca1f9322ad), and [Securing Membership](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2dab2012-c278-426a-bb0d-93b260c428a7). > [!NOTE] > 成员资格用户未获批准时，可以使用控件 (设置为`false`)，但它不能用于成员资格用户锁定时 (设置为`true`)。The control can be used when a membership user has not been approved ( is set to `false`), but it cannot be used when a membership user has been locked out ( is set to `true`). 使用发送电子邮件类。The email message is sent using the class. 若要能够向用户发送电子邮件，则必须在应用程序的 Web.config 文件中配置邮件服务器。To be able to send email to users, you must configure a mail server in your application's Web.config file. 你可以更改通过设置自定义消息发送到用户的电子邮件的内容属性。You can change the content of the email sent to users by setting a custom message in the property. > [!NOTE] > 不能保证用户将接收或查看电子邮件。It is not possible to guarantee that a user will receive or view an email message. 若要验证用户通过电子邮件中收到通知，请考虑提供消息中的确认链接，它使用户能确认已收到通知。To verify that a user has received a notification by email, consider providing a confirmation link in the message, allowing the user to confirm that the notification was received. ## 视图Views 控件具有三个状态或视图：The control has three states, or views: - 用户名视图-要求用户输入他或她注册的用户名。UserName view -- Asks the user for his or her registered user name. - 问题视图--要求用户提供重置的密码存储问题的答案。Question view -- Requires the user to provide the answer to a stored question to reset the password. - 成功视图--告知用户的密码恢复或重置是否成功。Success view -- Tells the user whether the password recovery or reset was successful. 仅当成员资格提供程序定义中时，控件将显示问题视图属性支持密码提示问题和答案。The control displays the Question view only when the membership provider defined in the property supports password question and answer. 下表列出的每个样式属性控制并指示它影响的视图。The following table lists each style property of the control and indicates which view it affects. |PropertyProperty|用户名视图UserName view|问题视图Question view|成功视图Success view| |--------------|-------------------|-------------------|------------------| ||是Yes|是Yes|是Yes| ||是Yes|是Yes|否No| ||是Yes|是Yes|否No| ||是Yes|是Yes|否No| ||是Yes|是Yes|否No| ||否No|否No|是Yes| ||是Yes|是Yes|否No| ||是Yes|是Yes|是Yes| ## 样式和模板Styles and Templates 你可以使用一套丰富的样式属性的外观进行自定义控件。You can use an extensive set of style properties to customize the appearance of the control. 或者，可以将自定义模板应用到三个视图中，如果需要完全控制控件的外观。Alternatively, you can apply custom templates to the three views if you need complete control over the appearance of the control. 你可以使用，和属性创建这些视图的模板。You can use the , and properties to create templates for these views. 如果你定义的视图的样式属性的模板不起作用。If you define a template for a view, the style properties of have no effect. 下表列出控件的样式属性并说明每个样式属性会影响哪些用户界面元素。The following table lists the control style properties and explains which UI element each style property affects. 有关哪些属性的每个样式应用到的列表，请参阅的单个样式属性的文档。For a list of which properties each style applies to, see the documentation for the individual style properties. |样式属性Style property|受影响的 UI 元素UI element affected| |--------------------|-------------------------| ||提交所有视图上的按钮。Submit buttons on all views.| ||向用户显示的错误文本。Error text displayed to the user.| ||链接到其他页。Links to other pages.| ||告知用户如何使用控件的页面上的说明文本。Instructional text on the page that tells users how to use the control.| ||所有输入字段，例如文本框的标签。Labels for all input fields, such as text boxes.| ||文本输入的输入的字段。Text entry input fields.| ||每个视图的标题文本。Title text for each view.| ||当密码恢复或重置尝试不成功时，向用户显示的文本。Text displayed to the user when the password recovery or reset attempt is successful.| 下表的列出哪些模板属性应用到每个视图中应用控件。The following table lists which template properties apply to each view in the control. 你必须在每个模板中设置的控件的列表，请参阅在单个模板属性的文档。For a list of the controls that you must set in each template, see the documentation for the individual template properties. |视图View|模板属性Template property| |----------|-----------------------| |UserNameUserName|| |问题Question|| |成功Success|| 当控件不使用模板，自定义属性控件适用于控件中的第一个文本框和属性，应用于控件的所有文本框。When the control is not customized with templates, the property of the control applies to the first text box in the control and the property, which is applied to all text boxes of the control. 如果控件自定义模板，则属性和属性将被忽略。If the control is customized with templates, then the property and the property are ignored. 在这种情况下，设置属性和直接每个模板子控件的属性。In this case, set the property and the property of each template child control directly. 控件属性的文本框，如表示和，页生命周期的所有阶段都可访问。 control properties represented by text boxes, such as and , are accessible during all phases of the page life cycle. 控件将选取由最终用户的方式进行任何更改由文本框触发的事件。The control will pick up any changes made by the end user by means of the event triggered by the textboxes. ## 验证分组Validation Groupings 控件创建的验证组的验证的控件，因此该其他输入页上的控件中的所有必填的字段验证程序不会影响控件。The control creates a validation group for all required field validators in the control so that other input controls on the page are not affected by validating the control. 默认情况下，属性控件用作验证组的名称。By default, the property of the control is used as the name of the validation group. 例如，具有 ID"PasswordRecovery1"控件将使用"PasswordRecovery1"的验证组名称。For example, a control with the ID "PasswordRecovery1" will use a validation group name of "PasswordRecovery1". 如果你想参与另一个验证组控件，必须将控件模板。If you want the control to participate in another validation group, you must template the control. ## 应用 CSS 样式Applying CSS Styles 控制可用于在标记中指定 CSS 样式规则。The control lets you specify CSS style rules in markup. 如果你使用模板的外观进行自定义控件，你可以在模板中标记中指定 CSS 样式。If you use templates to customize the appearance of the control, you can specify CSS styles in the markup in the templates. 在这种情况下，没有额外的外部表是必需的。In that case, no extra outer table is required. 你可以防止通过设置呈现表属性`false`。You can prevent the table from being rendered by setting the property to `false`. ## 可访问性Accessibility 有关如何配置此控件，以使其生成符合辅助功能标准的标记的信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的辅助功能](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件。The following code example demonstrates using the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含密码恢复确认答案文本框的标签文本。The property contains the label text for the password recovery confirmation answer text box. 中的样式设置属性定义中指定的文本的外观属性。The style settings in the property define the appearance of the text specified in the property. 如果将分配中的模板属性，属性不起作用。If you assign a template in the property, the property has no effect. 属性的默认文本进行了本地化基于服务器的区域设置。The default text for the property is localized based on the server's locale setting. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置到字符串的属性"您的答案:"。The following code example sets the property to the string "Your answer:". remarks.format: ## Remarks 中定义的成员资格提供程序不验证密码恢复问题的答案时，将引发事件属性。The event is raised when the answer to the password recovery question is not validated by the membership provider defined in the property. 如果成员资格提供程序不支持密码恢复问题和答案，永远不会引发事件。If the membership provider does not support password recovery question and answer, the event is never raised. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用事件重置属性，如果用户输入的密码确认提示问题答案无效。The following code example uses the event to reset the property if the user enters an invalid answer to the password confirmation question. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性定义中的错误消息的外观控件。The property defines the appearance of error messages in the control. 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性对象返回。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 你可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`表示的属性类 (例如， `FailureTextStyle-ForeColor`)。You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the class (for example, `FailureTextStyle-ForeColor`). 你可以以编程方式设置此属性的形式`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `FailureTextStyle.ForeColor`)。You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `FailureTextStyle.ForeColor`). 常用的设置包括自定义的背景色、 文本颜色和字体属性。Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties. 属性定义以下属性的外观：The property defines the appearance of the following properties: - - - 样式设置属性合并的样式设置控件。The style settings for the property are merged with the style settings for the control. 在中所做的任何设置属性重写的属性中的相应设置控件。Any settings made in the property override the corresponding settings in properties of the control. 以下样式属性重写了设置：The following style properties are overridden by settings: - - - - - - - - - - - 当你使用模板定义的外观控件，属性不起作用。When you use templates to define the appearance of the control, the property has no effect. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性设置中的错误消息的样式属性控件。The following code example uses the property to set the style property for error messages in the control. value.span: 由于问题成员资格提供程序不通过电子邮件发送用户的密码时显示的错误消息。

span.span: The error message displayed when the user's password will not be sent by email because of a problem with the membership provider.

value.span: 默认值为“您恢复密码的尝试失败。

span.span: The default is "Your attempt to retrieve your password has failed.
Please try again."

remarks.format: ## Remarks 管理的用户信息的成员资格提供程序问题时，向用户显示的属性控件。The property is displayed to the user when there is a problem with the membership provider that manages user information for the control. 通常情况下，成员资格提供程序无法连接到包含用户信息的数据存储时，将显示属性。Typically, the property is displayed when the membership provider cannot connect to the data store containing user information. 中指定的文本当提供程序无法在数据库中找到指定的用户名称，属性将显示在用户名视图。The text specified in the property is displayed in the UserName view when the provider cannot find the specified user name in the database. 用户输入的答案与存储的答案不匹配时，问题视图中显示的属性。The property is displayed in the Question view when the answer entered by the user does not match the stored answer. 属性显示的所有其他错误。The property is displayed for all other errors. 外观属性定义中的样式设置属性。The appearance of the property is defined by the style settings in the property. 当你将设置模板，以定义的外观控件，属性显示在一个可选与设置为"FailureText"的控件 ID 的控件。When you set templates to define the appearance of the control, the property is displayed in an optional control with the control ID set to "FailureText". 属性的默认文本进行了本地化基于服务器的区域设置。The default text for the property is localized based on the server's locale setting. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置属性。The following code example sets the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性定义的外观属性。The property defines the appearance of the property. 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性对象返回。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 可以在窗体以声明方式设置了属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`表示的属性类 (例如， `HyperLinkStyle-ForeColor`)。The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the class (for example, `HyperLinkStyle-ForeColor`). 你还可以设置属性以编程方式在窗体中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `HyperLinkStyle.ForeColor`)。You can also set the properties programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `HyperLinkStyle.ForeColor`). 常用的设置包括自定义的背景色、 文本颜色和字体属性。Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties. 样式设置与合并属性控件的样式设置。The style settings for the property are merged with control style settings. 在中所做的任何设置属性重写的属性中的相应设置控件。Any settings made in the property override the corresponding settings in properties of the control. 以下属性重写了设置：The following properties are overridden by settings: - - - - - - - - - - - 当你使用模板定义的外观控件的用户名视图或问题视图属性不起作用。When you use templates to define the appearance of the control's UserName view or Question view, the property has no effect. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性以突出显示帮助链接，当用户输入的用户名称，中的数据存储区中找不到控件。The following code example uses the property to highlight the Help page link when a user enters a user name that is not found in the data store in the control. summary.span: 获取对属性集合的引用，这些属性定义用于向用户发送新的或恢复的密码的电子邮件的特性。

span.span: Gets a reference to a collection of properties that define the characteristics of email messages used to send new or recovered passwords to users.

value.span: 对引用包含定义的用来发送其密码的用户的电子邮件消息的特征的属性。

span.span: A reference to a that contains properties that define the characteristics of email messages used to send users their passwords.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回对一组用于定义格式的属性和内容的密码电子邮件消息发送给用户的引用。The property returns a reference to a group of properties that you use to define format and content of the password email message sent to users. 常用的设置包括的主题行和发件人的寄信人地址。Common settings include the subject line and the sender's return address. 属性的完整列表，请参阅类。For a complete list of properties, see the class. 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性对象返回。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 你可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`表示的属性类 (例如， `MailDefinition-Subject`)。You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the class (for example, `MailDefinition-Subject`). 你还可以设置属性以编程方式在窗体中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `MailDefinition.Subject`)。You can also set the properties programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `MailDefinition.Subject`). 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). 当从创建电子邮件时对象，它将使以下表所示的替换。When the email message is created from the object, it will make the substitutions shown in the following table. 替换文本不区分大小写。The substitution text is case-insensitive. |替换文本Substitution text|替换为Replaced with| |-----------------------|-------------------| |**<%** `UserName` **%>****<%** `UserName` **%>**|网站用户的用户的名称。The Web site user name of the user.| |**\<%** *Password* **%>****\<%** *Password* **%>**|用户的恢复的密码。The recovered password for the user.| 如果属性对象是`true`，对电子邮件的内容将 HTML 编码的消息接收方防止跨站点脚本的安全漏洞。If the property of the object is `true`, the contents of the mail message will be HTML encoded to guard against cross-site scripting security vulnerabilities for the message recipient. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用事件，以通过设置子属性的定义密码电子邮件属性。The following code example uses the event to define the password email message by setting subproperties of the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[PasswordRecoveryMail#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PasswordRecoveryMail/CS/passwordrecoverymailcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[PasswordRecoveryMail#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PasswordRecoveryMail/VB/passwordrecoverymailvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识用于验证输入中的用户信息的成员资格提供程序控件。The property identifies the membership provider used to verify user information entered in the control. 在 Web.config 文件中定义成员资格提供程序 <`membership`> 部分。Membership providers are defined in the Web.config file in the <`membership`> section. 设置属性将更改使用的提供程序。Setting the property will change the provider used. 如果你未设置属性，它始终返回。If you do not set the property, it will always return . 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用事件来更改属性。The following code example uses the event to change the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁的文本框。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[PasswordRecoveryMembershipProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PasswordRecoveryMembershipProvider/CS/passwordrecoverymembershipprovidercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[PasswordRecoveryMembershipProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PasswordRecoveryMembershipProvider/VB/passwordrecoverymembershipprovidervb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks SMTP 邮件服务引发异常时调用方法。The method is called when the SMTP Mail service throws an exception. 默认实现将引发错误并且，如果未处理异常时，会再次引发异常时维护调用堆栈。The default implementation raises the error and, if the exception is not handled, rethrows the exception while maintaining the call stack. 检查属性对象作为传递`e`参数，以确定异常的实际原因。Examine the property of the object passed as the `e` parameter to determine the actual cause of the exception. 在开发期间，最常见原因，在于引发事件``Web.config 文件的部分不正确。During development, the most common reason that the event is raised is that the `` section of the Web.config file is incorrect. 在部署之后，可能因多种原因，最无需对电子邮件地址中的错误发生此事件。After deployment, this event can occur for a variety of reasons, most having to do with errors in an email address. 必须设置作为传递的对象属性`e`参数`true`发出信号，异常已处理; 否则为再次引发异常。You must set the property of the object passed as the `e` parameter to `true` to signal that the exception has been handled; otherwise, the exception is thrown again. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页中的服务器事件处理](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9)。For more information, see [Server Event Handling in ASP.NET Web Forms Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含 Web 站点以前建立用户的密码恢复确认问题。The property contains the password recovery confirmation question that the user previously established on the Web site. 仅在问题视图中显示属性。The property is displayed only in the Question view. 如果成员资格提供程序中指定属性不支持密码提示问题和答案，未显示问题视图和未使用属性。If the membership provider specified in the property does not support password question and answer, the Question view is not displayed and the property is not used. 只有在用户输入有效的用户名称后，成员资格提供程序返回问题。The membership provider returns the question only after the user enters a valid user name. 直到用户输入有效的用户名，属性是。Until the user enters a valid user name, the property is . 中的样式设置属性定义的外观属性。The style settings in the property define the appearance of the property. 当你使用属性来定义问题视图中的外观属性显示在一个可选控件替换为属性设置为"问题"。When you use the property to define the appearance of the Question view, the property is displayed in an optional control with the property set to "Question". 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含定义的外观的模板控制问题的视图。The property contains the template that defines the appearance of the control in Question view. 下表列出问题视图模板中使用的必需和可选控件。The following table lists the required and optional controls used in the Question view template. |ID 或命令名称ID or Command name|控件类型Control type|必需/可选Required/optional| |------------------------|------------------|------------------------| |`Answer`|实现任何控件。Any control that implements .|必需Required| |`Submit`|导致事件冒泡任何控件。Any control that causes event bubbling.|OptionalOptional| 提交控件可以是任何导致控件事件上传方法，如， ，或。The Submit control can be any control that causes event bubbling, such as , , or . 控件的命令名称属性必须设置为"提交"。The control's command name property must be set to "Submit". 控件将引发异常如果问题视图不包含所需的控件。The control throws an exception if the Question view does not contain the required controls. 在可选控件 ID 赋予错误类型; 的控件不引发任何异常但是，该控件随后将被忽略控件。No exception is thrown if you give an optional control ID to a control of the wrong type; however, the control is subsequently ignored by the control. 当你使用模板来定义问题视图的外观时，仅有以下属性会影响控件的行为：When you use a template to define the appearance of the Question view, only the following properties affect the behavior of the control: - 所有属性都继承自(有关详细信息，请参阅控件成员表)。All properties inherited from (for details, see the control members table). - 。. - 。. - 。. - 。. - 。. - 。. - 。. - 。. - 。. - 。. - 。. 问题视图使用模板时，所有其他属性都是处于非活动状态。All other properties are inactive when you use a template for the Question view. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示问题视图的默认模板。The following code example shows the default template for the Question view. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁的文本框。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 为了使内联样式属性，如适用于所有控件呈现的 HTML，ASP.NET 将中呈现的 HTML`table`元素。In order to make inline style properties such as apply to all the HTML that is rendered for the control, ASP.NET encloses the rendered HTML in a `table` element. 如果不希望外部`table`元素呈现，将此属性设置为`false`。If you do not want the outer `table` element to be rendered, set this property to `false`. 在这种情况下，如果你尝试设置应用于整个控件的样式属性的内联，则引发异常。In that case, if you try to set inline style properties that apply to the whole control, an exception is thrown.

summary.span: 在通过电子邮件向用户发送密码之前发生。

span.span: Occurs before the user is sent a password in email.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户请求新的或恢复密码，并且提交到密码确认问题 （如果成员资格提供程序支持密码提示问题和答案），正确答案后但在发送密码之前，在服务器上发生事件电子邮件中的用户。The event occurs on the server after the user requests a new or recovered password and submits a correct answer to the password confirmation question (if your membership provider supports password question and answer), but before the password is sent to the user in email. 使用此事件来执行前发送电子邮件，例如设置所需的任何特殊处理属性。Use this event to do any special processing required before sending the email message, such as setting properties. 用户输入有效的用户名称后，如果相关，一个有效的答案，控件都将引发事件，然后将密码信息发送给电子邮件中的用户。After the user enters a valid user name and, if relevant, a valid answer, the control raises the event, and then sends the password information to the user in email. 电子邮件使用中定义的设置``配置文件元素。The email uses the settings defined in the `` configuration file element. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用事件设置的属性包含电子邮件的对象。The following code example uses the event to set properties of the object that contains the email message. span.span: Occurs when the SMTP Mail system throws an error while attempting to send an email message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SMTP 邮件服务器尝试发送电子邮件时引发异常时引发事件。The event is raised when the SMTP mail server throws an exception when trying to send an email message. 默认值事件并不处理的邮件系统中的 SMTP 错误。The default event does not handle the SMTP error from the mail system. 处理的方法事件必须设置属性对象传递给`true`处理错误并防止它显示给用户。The method that handles the event must set the property of the object to `true` to handle the error and prevent it from being displayed to the user. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性定义中的提交按钮的外观控件。The property defines the appearance of Submit buttons in the control. 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性对象返回。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 你可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`表示的属性类 (例如， `SubmitButtonStyle-ForeColor`)。You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the class (for example, `SubmitButtonStyle-ForeColor`). 你还可以设置属性以编程方式在窗体中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `SubmitButtonStyle.ForeColor`)。You can also set the properties programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `SubmitButtonStyle.ForeColor`). 常用的设置包括自定义的背景色、 文本颜色和字体属性。Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties. 样式设置属性合并的样式设置控件。The style settings for the property are merged with the style settings for the control. 在中所做的任何设置属性重写的属性中的相应设置控件。Any settings made in the property override the corresponding settings in properties of the control. 以下属性重写了设置：The following properties are overridden by settings: - - - - - - - - - - - 当你使用模板来定义的初始的外观或问题视图控件，属性不起作用。When you use templates to define the appearance of the initial or Question view of the control, the property has no effect. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示设置的效果中的提交按钮的不同类型的属性控件。The following code example shows the effect of setting properties on the different types of Submit buttons in the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 时密码已成功发送到用户，属性显示在成功视图。The property is displayed in the Success view when a password has been successfully sent to a user. 中的样式设置属性定义的外观属性。The style settings in the property define the appearance of the property. 当你使用模板分配给属性，属性不起作用。When you use a template assigned to the property, the property has no effect. 如果属性不是`null`，用户定向到在中定义的页属性，与控件的成功视图不向用户显示。If the property is not `null`, the user is redirected to the page defined in the property, and the control's Success view is not shown to the user. 属性的默认文本进行了本地化基于服务器的区域设置。The default text for the property is localized based on the server's locale setting. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置属性设置为"你的密码已发送到我们的文件中的电子邮件地址。"The following code example sets the property to "Your password has been sent to the email address in our files." remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含由用户输入的用户名或如果用户未输入名称。The property contains the user name entered by the user, or if the user has not entered a name. 仅在用户名视图中使用属性。The property is used only in the UserName view. 属性保存在控件的控件状态保留到即使页关闭了视图状态的服务器的往返过程之间的值。The property is saved in the control's control state to preserve the values between round trips to the server even when view state is turned off for the page. 控件属性的文本框，如表示，页生命周期的所有阶段都可访问。 control properties represented by text boxes, such as , are accessible during all phases of the page life cycle. 控件将选取由最终用户的方式进行任何更改由文本框触发的事件。The control will pick up any changes made by the end user by means of the event triggered by the textboxes. 中的样式设置属性定义中的文本的外观属性。The style settings in the property define the appearance of the text in the property. 当分配的模板属性，以显示用户名视图中，属性分配中的必选输入的值控件替换为属性设置为"UserName"。When you assign a template to the property to display the UserName view, the property is assigned the value entered in a required control with the property set to "UserName". 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含定义的外观的模板用户名视图中的控件。The property contains the template that defines the appearance of the control in UserName view. 下表列出在用户名视图模板中使用的必需和可选控件。The following table lists the required and optional controls used in the UserName view template. |ID 或命令名称ID or Command name|控件类型Control type|必需/可选Required/optional| |------------------------|------------------|------------------------| |`UserName`|实现任何控件。Any control that implements .|OptionalOptional| |`Submit`|导致事件冒泡任何控件。Any control that causes event bubbling.|OptionalOptional| 提交控件可以是任何导致控件事件上传方法，如， ，或。The Submit control can be any control that causes event bubbling, such as , , or . 控件的`CommandName`属性必须设置为"提交"。The control's `CommandName` property must be set to "Submit". 控件将引发异常如果用户名视图不包含所需的控件。The control throws an exception if the UserName view does not contain the required controls. 在可选控件 ID 赋予错误类型; 的控件不引发任何异常但是，该控件随后将被忽略控件。No exception is thrown if you give an optional control ID to a control of the wrong type; however, the control is subsequently ignored by the control. 当你使用模板定义的用户名视图的外观时，仅有以下属性会影响控件的行为：When you use a template to define the appearance of the UserName view, only the following properties affect the behavior of the control: - 所有属性都继承自(请参阅控件成员表)。All properties inherited from (see the control members table). - 。. - 。. - 。. - 。. - 。. - 。. - 。. 所有其他属性都是处于非活动状态时使用的用户名视图模板控件。All other properties are inactive when you use a template for the UserName view of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性来定义的用户名视图的模板使用户能够选择包含他或她登录信息的域的控件。The following code example uses the property to define a template for the UserName view of the control that enables the user to choose the domain that contains his or her login information. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁的文本框。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). summary.span: 用户已提交密码恢复确认问题的答案时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user has submitted an answer to the password recovery confirmation question.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在用户提交密码确认问题的答案后，在服务器上发生事件。The event occurs on the server after the user submits the answer to the password confirmation question. 你可以使用此事件来准备由用户提交的成员资格提供程序，例如通过将转换为全部大写或小写字母的答案。You can use this event to prepare the answer submitted by the user for the membership provider, for example by converting it to all uppercase or lowercase letters. 控件首先引发成员资格提供程序中指定的事件，然后使用属性进行比较用户输入的网站中存储的密码答案。The control first raises the event, and then uses the membership provider specified in the property to compare the answer entered by the user with the password stored in the Web site. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例处理事件和更改所显示的属性。The following code example handles the event and changes the displayed property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁的文本框。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). summary.span: 在成员资格提供程序验证用户名之前发生。

span.span: Occurs before the user name is validated by the membership provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 前引发事件的服务器上的用户名提交到成员资格提供程序，以确定用户名称是否有效。The event is raised on the server before the user name is submitted to the membership provider to determine whether the user name is valid. 使用此事件来执行任何用户名，例如将为全部大写或小写字母、 转换或验证用户名称为特定的格式，如电子邮件地址上所需的预处理。Use this event to perform any preprocessing needed on the user name, such as converting it to all uppercase or lowercase letters, or verifying that the user name is in a particular format, such as an email address. 控件首先引发成员资格提供程序中指定的事件，然后使用属性来确定输入的用户名是否为有效的用户名称的网站。The control first raises the event, and then uses the membership provider specified in the property to determine whether the user name entered is a valid user name for the Web site. 如果它是有效，并且成员资格提供程序支持密码提示问题和答案，从网站返回密码验证问题和控件显示问题的视图。If it is valid, and the membership provider supports password question and answer, the password verification question is returned from the Web site and the control displays the Question view. 如果用户名称无效中的文本属性显示在用户名视图中，以便用户可以输入不同的用户名。If the user name is not valid, the text in the property is displayed in the UserName view so that the user can enter a different user name. 如果成员资格提供程序不支持密码提示问题和答案，引发事件并通过新的或恢复密码向用户发送电子邮件。If the membership provider does not support password question and answer, the event is raised and email is sent to the user with the new or recovered password. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用事件检查是否已提交的用户名已格式化为有效的电子邮件地址。The following code example uses the event to check whether the submitted user name is formatted as a valid email address. 如果用户名格式不正确，属性更改为显示错误。If the user name is not formatted properly, the property is changed to show the error. [!code-aspx-csharp[PasswordRecoveryBeforeUserLookup#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PasswordRecoveryBeforeUserLookup/CS/passwordrecoverybeforeuserlookupcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[PasswordRecoveryBeforeUserLookup#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PasswordRecoveryBeforeUserLookup/VB/passwordrecoverybeforeuserlookupvb.aspx#1)]
